title: Ehrakeziah
author: Ehrakeziah
content: Bitcoin was invented by the mysterious Satoshi Nakamoto in 2008 and released as open-source software in early 2009. It was gradually recognized by many until it reached a peak of $19,783 per bitcoin in late-2017. From the beginning of bitcoin history I know that many people become rich instantly when they hold their bitcoins and sold at the highest price last 2017.  After the price of bitcoin fluctuated and dropped where many investors got scared and started to panic to sell their bitcoin even if they went bankrupt. But we cannot hide that bitcoin has changed many lives.On the other hand, after bitcoin dump many are still investing, especially as the price of bitcoin gradually rises again. And due to the continuous development of bitcoin it has become more and more popular and attractive to investors especially to the rich and big companies. Now bitcoin is preparing to reach another ATH. Are you still there and holding your bitcoins? What happened to your life after 10 years in bitcoin? Is there any changes?

comments.author: Wysi
comments.body: I have been aware of bitcoin from past 6 years and I would say it has been a passive income as well as a boon for me at the time of need even though I missed out early investments but I had bitcoin's earned through signature campaigns which I couldn't exchange at that point if time due to inferior value which laster turned out to be a very profitable during 2017 bull run. I wish I would have invested into Bitcoin when it was new, but nevertheless it has improved my standard of living and now I don't need to pay huge fees for money exchangers if I have to make cross border payments. This is just my experience which might vary from those who invested at peak and did panic selling as they Amy either consider it as a lesson or curse.

comments.author: pixie85
comments.body: I bought Bitcoin in its lows in 2016 and held through the 2018 all time high. I don't feel rich and have no regrets now that it's again in a new high. It's still very early for Bitcoin and I know that 50 thousand dollars is not some very distant dream. It can happen within weeks when more institutions come in and put 1% of their money into it.My life has changed for the better because thanks to Bitcoin I felt safe financially. I did not sell but it gave me the confidence to invest and take on new daring fiat projects because I knew that if anything goes wrong I'll still have my bitcoin savings.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: There are not too many people have 10 years or more in the bitcoin market. Most of very early bitcoiners and forum members are rich enough to enjoy their lives. Many of them abandoned the forum and find joy somewhere else.I don't have many years in crypto, less than 4 years but the bitcoin market is not a market for greedy and emotional people. All orders for trade or investment must be done with investigation and risk management. Without such skills and works, capital will be lost gradually and at the ends people will hate the market.

comments.author: so98nn
comments.body: It's roughly 5-6 years only since when I am actually into bitcoin. I already heard about the bitcoin from series "Big Bang Theory", a comedian show that used to get aired on Netflix back in time. Literally heard it only twice or thrice and never looked back it until the news started floating around my country. We had many black money holders and suddenly it came to notice bitcoin is being used as escape route. So the thing is, I have entered bitcoin at the time when it was already at it's peak and most of the people were rich by then. But surely, up until now the role of bitcoin in my life has been tremendously supportive considering the financial needs of me or family. I never greed for richness, but just small chunks now and then so as to give extra backbone to finances and I think it's going pretty well with bitcoin.
